name: Pupper Park (itch)
description:
Pupper Park is a sandbox game about dogs in a park. Play as a dog and fetch balls, run around, scare frogs, and play football.

Try to collect as many bones before the park closes!

Note: the game is best played with XBOX-360 controllers, press the spacebar to add a second player!

Features

  • A cute playground to explore.
  • Funny dogs.
  • Local multiplayer up to 2 players.
  • Find, earn, and collect bones.
  • Play with physics.
  • Cool procedural animations.
  • Support for XBOX-360 Controllers.
Current Sokpop Collection
